%%sql

delete from odw_harmonised_db.SAP_HR_PC ;

insert into odw_harmonised_db.SAP_HR_PC(



SELECT 
	   RefNo
      ,NULLIF(EthnicOrigin, '')
      ,NULLIF(ReligiousDenominationKey, '')
      ,NULLIF(SxO, '')
      ,Grade
      ,NULLIF(DisabilityText, '')
      ,cast(to_timestamp(Report_MonthEnd_Date, "dd/MM/yyyy") as date)  as Report_MonthEnd_Date
      , 'saphr' AS SourceSystemID
    ,CURRENT_DATE() AS IngestionDate
   , CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AS ValidTo
   , NULL AS RowID,
    'Y' AS IsActive

from odw_standardised_db.sap_protected_monthly

%%sql

UPDATE odw_harmonised_db.SAP_HR_PC
SET RowID = md5(
    concat_ws('|',
	   RefNo
      ,EthnicOrigin
      ,ReligiousDenominationKey
      ,SxO
      ,Grade
      ,DisabilityText
      )

%%sql

WITH pc AS (
    SELECT 
        Report_MonthEnd_Date,
        COUNT(*) AS s_count
    FROM odw_harmonised_db.SAP_HR_PC
    WHERE RefNo IS NOT NULL
    GROUP BY Report_MonthEnd_Date
),
x2 AS (
    SELECT 
       cast(to_timestamp(Report_MonthEnd_Date, "dd/MM/yyyy") as date) as Report_MonthEnd_Date, 
        COUNT(*) AS history_rows
    FROM 
        odw_harmonised_db.hist_SAP_HR h 
    WHERE 
        left(Report_MonthEnd_Date,7) > '2019-03' 
        AND h.PayrollArea = 'PINS'
    GROUP BY 
        Report_MonthEnd_Date
),
to_delete AS (
    SELECT pc.Report_MonthEnd_Date
    FROM pc 
    INNER JOIN x2 
        ON pc.Report_MonthEnd_Date = x2.Report_MonthEnd_Date
    WHERE pc.s_count = x2.history_rows
),
source_data AS (
    SELECT 
        SAP_HR_PC.*,
        CASE 
            WHEN to_delete.Report_MonthEnd_Date IS NOT NULL THEN 'DELETE'
            ELSE 'INSERT'
        END AS action
    FROM odw_harmonised_db.SAP_HR_PC
    LEFT JOIN to_delete 
        ON SAP_HR_PC.Report_MonthEnd_Date = to_delete.Report_MonthEnd_Date
),
deduplicated_source AS (
    SELECT 
        *,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY Report_MonthEnd_Date ORDER BY RefNo) AS row_num
    FROM source_data
)
-- Use MERGE to delete and insert rows
MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.sap_hr_protected_data AS target
USING (
    SELECT * 
    FROM deduplicated_source 
    WHERE row_num = 1 -- Ensure only one row per Report_MonthEnd_Date
) AS source
ON target.Report_MonthEnd_Date = source.Report_MonthEnd_Date
WHEN MATCHED AND source.action = 'DELETE' THEN DELETE
WHEN NOT MATCHED AND source.action = 'INSERT' THEN INSERT *;
